#################################################

Release Type: PC Game
Game: Escape Whisper Valley
Language: English
 
#################################################

System Requirements:
Processor: Pentium 2 - 350MHz or better
RAM: 256MB
DirectX Version: 7.0 or above
Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Escape Whisper Valley_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

A sudden rockslide has left you trapped in Whisper Valley, an abandoned mountain village. Can you piece together the clues that will lead you back home? Explore 25 intriguing locations and track down 2,000 objects in the new hidden object game from the makers of Escape Rosecliff IslandT. Solve 7 mini-game puzzles and collect fragments of a map to help you find your way home. Locate the hidden locks and keys in every scene and unlock two bonus game modes: Unlimited Seek & Find, and a Mystery Bonus Game. Play Escape Whisper ValleyT now!

#################################################
